column14: Description
This module is to generate types of report
All the stories about having a ward management module.
All the stories about having a patient management module.
This include all the story about the appointment module.
as as staff i can view the total appointment that have been Approved/Rejected/Cancelled
as a staff i can view every patient' medical condition in the period of date selected
as a staff i can view the drugs distributed's report
as a staff i can able to view the monthly report of the patient who has visited the hospital
As a staff, I can check out every patients selected.
As a nurse, after checking up a patient, the details of the checking-up can be recorded.
As a nurse, I can assign a ward room number to a patient.
As a staff, I can view every information of the ward such as availability and price
As a staff, i can view the information of the staffs working in the ward.
As a customer/patient, i would like to view my appointment to which particular doctor.
column23: Create and display the appointment info on the UI

column14: As a staff, i can delete the prescription of the patient selected.
As a staff, i can view the search for the status of prescription of the patient selected
As a staff, i can update the current patients' prescription's status.
As a staff, i can view the most updated prescription of the staff selected.
As a hospital clerk, I want to be able to update the information of a particular patient.
As a hospital clerk, I want to be able to view the information of a particular patient.
As a hospital clerk, I want to be able to search for a registered patient information.
As a hospital clerk, I want to be able to register a patient information.
As a customer/patient, i am able to cancel the appointment so that the doctor have the free slot and allow other customer/patient to make appointment on that free slot.
column23: Create and display the appointment details on the UI

column14: As a customer/patient, i am able to modify the appointment details so that i am able to attend the appointment.

column14: As a customer/patient, i will be able to make appointment with the doctor for medical treatment.
